entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
